General.Name: Axiomtek Co Ltd
General.Description: Axiomtek Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells industrial computers and embedded platforms worldwide. It offers boards and modules, including industrial and embedded motherboards, system on modules, single board computers, add-on card and peripheral products, and smart display units; and systems and platforms, which include embedded systems, industrial PCs, AI and machine vision products, edge AI GPU computing products, transportation systems, network communication platform, digital signage players, and medical-grade systems. The company also provides fanless touch panel PCs, touch panel PCs and monitors, medical computing products, transportation computing products, and accessories; and Artificial Intelligence of Things (AIoT) solutions comprising automation, autonomous mobile robots, software, intelligent transportation, intelligent retail and hospitality, and intelligent medical products. Its products are used in industrial automation, transportation, medical, AIoT, retail, power and energy, networking and communication, and gaming applications. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in City Of Industry, California.
General.Address: 18138 Rowland Street, City Of Industry, CA, United States, 91748
